加薬: (かやく) - spices; seasoning; adding extra ingredients (med)

加薬飯: (かやくめし) - boiled rice mixed with vegetables and meat or fish

劣らず: (おとらず) - with the best of them; as the next fellow

劣勢: (れっせい) - (ant: 優勢) inferiority (e.g. numerical); inferior position; disadvantage; unfavorable situation; unfavourable situation

劣等種: (れっとうしゅ) - inferior species; inferior breed; inferior race
劣等複合: (れっとうふくごう) - inferiority complex

助く: (たすく) - to help; to save; to rescue
助ける: (たすける) - to help; to save; to rescue; to give relief to; to spare (life); to reinforce; to promote; to abet
助けを借りる: (たすけをかりる) - to get help; to enlist aid
助け上げる: (たすけあげる) - to help up; to pick up; to bring safely to land
助け出す: (たすけだす) - to help out of (trouble); to extricate
助け合う: (たすけあう) - to help each other; to cooperate
助け守る: (たすけまもる) - to protect; to preserve; to keep

助け船: (たすけぶね) - lifeboat; friend in need; timely help
助け起こす: (たすけおこす) - to help up
